cause.description:
Please help me support my friend Marisa Mitchell as she takes an amazing journey in the fight against breast cancer! The Breast Cancer 3-Day is a 60-mile walk over the course of three days. Net proceeds benefit Susan G. Komen for the Cure and the National Philanthropic Trust, funding important breast cancer research, education, screening, and treatment.
1. Together we can stop breast cancer
2. Funds are key for breast cancer research, education, screening, and treatment.
cause.mission: To raise as much money as we can to help women with breast cancer
cause.name: Let's fight breast cancer together
